text: Melbourne Water is owned by the Victorian State Government. It looks after many of the water bodies and supplies in metropolitan Melbourne, the capital of Victoria. It's responsible for all the reservoirs, lakes, wetlands, canals and urban creeks, and the sewerage and drainage systems that service the city. Melbourne Water is managed by its Board of Directors and the Minister for Water. ==References== Category:1992 establishments in Australia Category:Government agencies of Australia
title: Melbourne Water
